abstract: When billionaire Carl C. Icahn lost a battle last year to win seats on Motorola‘s board, he vowed that if the company failed to deliver better results, he’d be back. Now he is – and he has brought his lawyers with him.
lead_paragraph: When billionaire Carl C. Icahn lost a battle last year to win seats on Motorola‘s board, he vowed that if the company failed to deliver better results, he’d be back. Now he is – and he has brought his lawyers with him.

headline.main: Icahn’s Legal Move Turns Up the Heat on Motorola
